page.description: The FTP_GET_LIST() function retrieves a list of files in a directory over a FTP connection.
page.prototype: File_List as C = ftp_get_list(C address ,C user ,C password [,C path [,L NLIST ]])

argument.name: address
argument.description: The FTP address of the transmission. Character

argument.name: path
argument.description: Optional. Default = The directory of the Address. The path of the directory to examine.

argument.name: NLIST
argument.description:
Logical. Optional. Default = .F.
.T. = The names of the files
.F. = Owner, group, size, date, and name of files

section.note: The format of the directory listing varies from server to server.

section.title: Example
section.description: This example retrieves only file names.
section.example: dim fl as C fl = ? ftp_get_list("www.alphasoftware.com", "alphadoc2", "@lph@5", "/products/review", .t.) ? fl = A1BookingScreen.jpg A1ControlCentre.jpg A1Invoice.jpg Action_Script_ADO_ODBC_Data.jpg Action_Script_View_Xbasic.jpg ...
